errors.template: Invalid identifier for %s — must match ^[A-Za-z0-9_\-:.]+$ and be <=128 chars.

guidance.cause: An identifier contains disallowed characters or exceeds the maximum length.
actions: Rename it to use only alphanumerics plus _ - : .

errors.template: Cannot overwrite builtin part '%s' without Save-As-New.

guidance.cause: Attempted to save a part under a builtin name without requesting Save-As-New.
actions: Use Save-As-New and provide a unique new name.
If you intended to update a user part, confirm you selected the user part (not the builtin).

errors.template: Failed to read device '%s' — I/O error: %s

guidance.cause: The device is disconnected, powered off, or the underlying driver cannot communicate (USB/ETH timeout, permissions).
actions: Verify OS-level drivers/permissions and restart the backend.

guidance.cause: The device is present but busy or wedged.
actions: Try a device reset action (if available).

guidance.cause: The override file could not be read (missing file, permissions).
actions: Verify the file exists and the backend has read permissions.
If running in a container, confirm the volume mount/path.

guidance.cause: The override file contains malformed JSON.
actions: Validate the override against the expected schema.
